Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

I hope this is the right area to seek help!

I reduced the mods to nearly the core and im still crashing, kinda bummer. I think its SCANSat but im not sure. If somebody could help me read log i could help myself in the future, but as for now i have no idea where to seek, atleast i didn't found it.

I have installed Firespitter
CommunityRessourcePack
InterstellarFuelSwitch
StarLionIndustries
AtomicAge
FerramAerospaceResearch
KerbalJointReinforcement
ModularFlightIntegrator
Kopernicus
OPM
RealPlumbe Stock
SmokeScreen
RealPlumbe
WasdEditorCamera
ContractConfigurator
ConnectedLivingSpace
SCANSat
Mechjeb2

Some Mods doesn't make sense, but keep in mind that this is not a full list that is finished.

Output_Log.txt - Mod-List
Moving to the technical support forum.  (Plugin Development Help & Support is to help people who are trying to create mods.)

42 minutes ago, eSportWarrior said:

If somebody could help me read log i could help myself in the future, but as for now i have no idea where to seek, atleast i didn't found it.

Unfortunately, it appears that you restarted the game after the crash before uploading the log because there is no sign of a crash, it appears that you exited from your save out to the main menu and quit normally.  The game overwrites the file every time you start the game so, when you do get a crash, you need to upload the log straight away (or at least copy it somewhere else and preferably rename it, e.g. output_log_crashinvab.txt).

Also, just saying that your game is crashing is not very helpful.  How does it crash, what were you doing etc.?
